subject: Forked Java VM exited abnormally
msgSnippet: Hi All, I am using jdk 1.5 build 6 with ant 1.7 version. when i am executing my test framework i am getting following error... Forked Java VM exited
messageBody:
Hi All,

I am using jdk 1.5 build 6 with ant 1.7 version. when i am executing my
test framework i am getting following error...

"Forked Java VM exited abnormally. Please note the time in the report
does not reflect the time until the VM exit.
|junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: Forked Java VM exited abnormally.
Please note the time in the report does not reflect the time until the
VM exit."

|Any suggestions?

--
Thanks & Regards,
Nikhil
